summary: Dark, minimal experimental portfolio website for GitHub Pages with split Flexbox layout, background image, rotating vinyl with audio play/pause control, and glassmorphism overlays for category content.
architectural_notes: Deploy as a static site compatible with GitHub Pages (relative paths; no server dependencies).
Framework-free implementation using plain HTML/CSS/JS; Flexbox for the horizontal split layout.
Vinyl rotation should be controlled via CSS animation toggled by JS and kept in sync with HTMLAudioElement play/pause.
Glassmorphism overlay: use CSS backdrop-filter blur with a transparent panel; content populated dynamically (e.g., from embedded JSON or separate static files).

existing_features.title: Create a single-page dark, minimal, experimental portfolio UI with a full-screen background image named "bg.png" that is visually dimmed (reduced brightness) and uses white typography throughout.

Implement a horizontally split layout using Flexbox: left column for title/tagline/categories, right column for the vinyl UI. Ensure elements are aligned, non-overlapping, and responsive (including small screens).

Render the left column content with: (1) site title text exactly "shibhi.studio"; (2) a cursive italic tagline exactly "Not just for a television, Teleport to where it’s written."; (3) a vertical list of interactive categories: Photography, Blender & Animations, Design, Electronics.

Add clear pointer/hover/active interaction affordances for category options and the play/pause button (e.g., cursor change, hover styling, focus styles). Ensure keyboard accessibility for opening/closing overlays and toggling play/pause.
Display a large vinyl record image named "vinyl.png" in the right column and implement smooth continuous rotation when audio is playing; rotation must pause when audio is paused.
Add a play/pause toggle button positioned at the center of the vinyl. When pressed, it must start/pause playback of an MP3 audio file and simultaneously control the vinyl rotation state.
Implement category overlays: clicking any category opens a small glass-morphism style overlay panel (transparent with blurred backdrop) that displays dynamically loaded content for that category.

Ensure all static assets (bg.png, vinyl.png, and the MP3 file) are handled as frontend static files and referenced in a way that works when deployed under a non-root base path (e.g., GitHub Pages-style subpath hosting).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create full-screen dark minimal layout with bg.png dimmed and white typography; horizontally split via Flexbox into left/right columns
Left column: title “shibhi.studio”, cursive italic tagline, and interactive vertical category list (Photography, Blender & Animations, Design, Electronics) with clear pointer/hover states
Right column: display large vinyl.png that rotates smoothly when playing
Center play/pause button on vinyl that starts/pauses MP3 playback and synchronizes vinyl rotation state
On category click, open a small glassmorphism overlay panel (transparent + blurred) that shows dynamically loaded content
Ensure responsive, non-overlapping alignment and correct behavior when deployed on GitHub Pages using framework-free HTML/CSS/JS

projectName: Dark minimal split-layout portfolio with rotating vinyl + audio and glassmorphism overlays
